mapper.insert:
select team_seq.nextval from dual
insert into team(player_no, b_position_no, dept_no, back_no, player_name, player_birth, height, weight, player_sal, contract_start, contract_done, player_tel, player_info, player_status, player_address, player_address_detail, player_zipcode, player_image) values(playerNo, #{positionNo}, #{deptNo}, #{backNo}, #{playerName}, #{playerBirth}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{playerSal}, #{contractStart}, #{contractDone}, #{playerTel}, #{playerInfo}, #{playerStatus}, #{playerAddress}, #{playerAddressDetail}, #{playerZipcode}, #{playerImage})
